name: 3.8 "Diane Meets Mom" Online Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Frasier's.

	Frasier's mom was also a scientist (psychology being one of the sciences). She did not like Diane and made it clear to Diane how she felt.

Nancy Marchand.

	Nancy Marchand was born on June 19, 1928 in Buffalo, NY. She is best known for her role as Mrs. Pynchon on "Lou Grant".

questions.text: Who had a birthday in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	George Wendt's, who played Norm, birthday is October 17, 1948. On the show, Norm told everyone not to make a big fuss but really he wanted people to make a fuss.

questions.text: How old was the birthday boy?
questions.explanation:
36.

	Cliff bought Norm a beer. Sam ended up unintentionally paying up for some cosmetic surgery for Norm.

questions.correct: He was hit in the head by a cork from a wine bottle.
options: He got really drunk and passed out.
He found out he had a bad heart.
questions.explanation:
He was hit in the head by a cork from a wine bottle.

	Sam paid for Norm to go to the hospital. According to ask.com, there is about 24 fatalities from champagne bottle corks every year.

questions.text: What did the mother do to threaten Diane?
questions.explanation:
threatened to kill her.

	She told Diane, "I have a gun and I know how to use it." This scared Diane so she went to Sam for advice.

questions.text: When Diane asked Sam "Do you think I'm crazy?", how did Sam reply?
questions.explanation:
yes.

	Sam continually said he thought Diane was crazy. However, Diane thought he was just being a wise guy.

questions.text: What did Sam think Diane was when he first met her?
questions.explanation:
a twit.

	Diane said that Hester (Frasier's mother) must have thought she was a twit. Sam replied that that was what he thought when he first met her too.

questions.text: What did Norm have done at the hospital?
questions.explanation:
had a mole removed.

	Sam said Norm took advantage of him by having the mole removed. Norm said he thought that Sam would want to throw the mole in as a birthday present.

questions.text: Why did Sam tell Frasier's mother she didn't have enough money to take Diane back?
questions.explanation:
"There isn't enough money."

	Hester said she understood and Sam said "I don't think you do." In the end Frasier and Diane stayed together.
